title: Is it THE HIMALYAS or any other mountains range??
selftext:
whenever the clouds move away quickly after rain ☔ these mountains pop-up 😁 ... 
I live in Moradabad and always wondered is it himalyas or any other mountain range... Do anyone have idea about this ?
comments:
Himalayas.

other ranges with snow won't be visible from Moradabad.
Just open your Google maps, zoom in at city level and figure out. Pretty easy to do as I use this whenever I want to identify a chain of mountains I'm looking at
The straight-line distance from Moradabad to the closest snow clad mountains in Uttarakhand appears to be just 180 odd kilometers. So, yes it is Himalayas.
